revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=LaCie |model=2Big |revision=Network |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=03/2008 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5182 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=0.5 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV400CBTC-70G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS561621B |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, High Performance CPLD;Xilinx;XC9536XL;;1;,,, CMOS 8K 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Holtek;HT24LC08;;1;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG30;;1;,,, 1.5A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG16;;1;,,, 12-bit to 24-bit Multiplexed D-Type Latch;TI;ALVCH162260;;1;,,, 3A 600kHz Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4519;;2; |flags=RTC, power switch, fan, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;Marvell v1.7.3 LaCie v1.4.alpha_3; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.12-6;-arm1; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:D0:4B }} {{TagLine|LaCie 2Big Network}} :[https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/2big-network/ Support page]
"2Big-NAS-Marvell", "0609 204 Rev C" and "LaCie Group" :are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|LaCie 2Big NAS|LaCie 5Big Network|LaCie}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F5182 ''Feroceon'' @400MHz ARMv5 *Storage: 512KB (NOR) Flash, 2x SATA ports *Memory: 64MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 12V/4A via barrel
===Links=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/lacie-2big-network-review-no-frills-raid-1-nas/ ''LaCie 2big Network Review'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=2big_network ''Lacie 2big Network'' on '''LaCie NAS Wiki''']
